nodes.text: Camp Shadow was a Balmorran resistance base in the Moraine Gulch, a region of the Gorinth Canyon on the planet Balmorra. During the final days of fighting on Balmorra during the Galactic War, Imperial forces overran the camp, forcing Taya Rinn and the rest of the resistance members there to flee to Moraine Outpost. Rinn later recruited Republic help in retrieving resistance data from the camp's computers.
